title: notblox1
author: notblox1
created_time: August 08, 2023, 11:03:52 PMLast edit: August 10, 2023, 08:32:09 PM by notblox1
content: Campaign Manager ChallengeRead the RULES:Code:1. Predict ONE Bitcointalk Campaign Manager with Highest Paying Campaign in bitcointalk forum.2. Predict exact name of campaign, amount of money users will be paid per post, per week, and max number of posts per week.3. Predict first three campaign managers in exact order of highest paying campaigns.4. Post YES if you want to place additional bet and send more BTC for big reward fund.Final Results will be posted on August 25.You can post any active bitcointalk campaign manager you want.First user to correctly or close enough predict outcome will receive reward.Campaign managers are excluded from this challenge ONE winner takes all! Rewards:$50 in Bitcoin guaranteed + shared rewardsI am holding guaranteed $50 in BTC, and you can send more BTC for higher reward, GazetaBitcoin will be escrow. Let the Games Begin!Example:1. icopress2. MixTum, $6, $210 max, 35 max.3. icopress, Hhampuz, Royse7774. YESPlease use exact template example I posted.No editing of posts is allowed, I will decide the winner based on correct predictions with time posted, and I have the right to exclude anyone from participation.You are not eligible for participation if you are not active forum member or if you are only or mostly posting in Games and rounds.Contact me with PM if you want to become a sponsor of Game of Thrones

comments.author: notblox1
comments.body: Quote from: Danydee on August 09, 2023, 08:08:12 PM1. what is the deadline for participating?You can post once at anytime before August 25, but only one guy wins who posted correctly first at earliest time. Quote from: Danydee on August 09, 2023, 08:08:12 PM2. about 2nd rule.. what about campaigns that are not (per post) paying ??You can do the math and calculate how much they actually pay per post.Some campaign could pay $300 per week in total and ask for 200 posts, so that is obviously not highest paying campaign.That is why I am also asking for maximum number of posts Quote from: Woodie on August 09, 2023, 07:47:08 AM1. icopress2. MixTum, $6, $210 max, 35 max.3. icopress, Carollzinha , Hhampuz & Royse7774. NoWoodie.Please make another post and include only 3 managers in third question.You cant have both Hhampuz and Royse777 in the same place, and I will do total amount they pay to all participants to calculate higher paying campaign.

comments.author: GazetaBitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: notblox1 on August 09, 2023, 08:25:47 PM.Please make another post and include only 3 managers in third question.As far as I understand, this is not possible, is it? His post is already disqualified as it is not eligible.Quote from: notblox1 on August 08, 2023, 11:03:52 PMNo editing of posts is allowedAt same time there is no rule forbidding multiple votes so we have a contradiction here.

comments.author: notblox1
comments.body: Quote from: GazetaBitcoin on August 09, 2023, 08:37:55 PMAs far as I understand, this is not possible, is it? His post is already disqualified as it is not eligible.I will delete his previous post and count only his new post, but date and time will have to be changed No contradiction and no breaking of rules.

comments.author: GazetaBitcoin
comments.created_time: August 09, 2023, 09:30:37 PMLast edit: August 09, 2023, 09:47:35 PM by GazetaBitcoin
comments.body: This is a good and valid workaround, yet since there is no rule against multiple voting, this may still happen. Let's hope though that a "gentlemen's agreeemnt" will make this not happen...Edit: after a discussion with OP, I will be the one holding the additional funds as escrow. Let's hope that more users will be willing now to add additional funds to this contest

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Right now it looks too easy and obvious answers. You need something that is not always in public and at the end of the round you will ask the campaign manager to validate the prediction. Use calendar week. Like right now we are in week # 32 so this prediction game will stay x weeks long and the week starts from calendar week # 33 or week #34. The questions can be like: - Which manager will send highest total payout and the campaign name.- Name three manager who will pay total highest payout in a week in the given calendar time frame from highest to lower.- Which manager will pay highest number of participants in a week and the campaign name- Which manager will pay lowest number of participants and the campaign nameThese are just some idea, feel free to improve yourself :-) I think this will make the game more interesting as the participants really needs to do their analysis and post their prediction.Edit, just giving some direct opinion of the questions right now you have:Quote1. Predict ONE Bitcointalk Campaign Manager with Highest Paying Campaign in bitcointalk forum.Highest paying in what? weekly individual total or weekly total payment of the campaign. If you are meaning the weekly total payment for a week then it's interesting but weekly individual total is easy to predict.Quote2. Predict exact name of campaign, amount of money users will be paid per post, per week, and max number of posts per week.Again if this is for individual then I think easy to predict.Quote3. Predict first three campaign managers in exact order of highest paying campaigns.I guess you are meaning total weekly payment in a campaign then again it sounds like very similar to #1

If you are meaning the weekly total payment for a week then it's interesting but weekly individual total is easy to predict.I am counting individual rewards first, but some campaigns have complicated calculations so I will have to add total payments, maximum number of posts, and other limitations in calculation.Quote from: Royse777 on August 10, 2023, 06:27:15 AMAgain if this is for individual then I think easy to predict.If it is so easy to predict go ahead and do it, but remember that one guy will win who post correct prediction first, and other managers can always change payrates in next two weeks  Quote from: Royse777 on August 10, 2023, 06:27:15 AMI guess you are meaning total weekly payment in a campaign then again it sounds like very similar to #1I am only taking highest paying campaigns from all managers.I will try to clarify rules for next rounds, Game of Thrones is a young project but we want to improve If anyone is interested to become a sponsor for Game of Thrones send me a PM
